body_html: @zou3519 I understand, but isn’t it caused by undefined inputs? If you were to swap those two blocks you would have a guarantee that they will all be defined. I think it’s a better fix that will let us avoid unnecessary checks in other places
body_text: @zou3519 I understand, but isn’t it caused by undefined inputs? If you were to swap those two blocks you would have a guarantee that they will all be defined. I think it’s a better fix that will let us avoid unnecessary checks in other places
body: @zou3519 I understand, but isn’t it caused by undefined inputs? If you were to swap those two blocks you would have a guarantee that they will all be defined. I think it’s a better fix that will let us avoid unnecessary checks in other places
